snippet: BLOCK--Marsha Ann, of Jericho, LI, daughter of Max and Mitzi Goorland, died on Wednesday, January 20, 2016, after a long battle with pancreatic cancer. She is survived by her daughters Margot and Amy Serwer; sister Michele, and her grandchildren Matthew, Russell, Samantha, and Liv. We will miss her energy, strength, and zest for life. 1/3
lead_paragraph: BLOCK--Marsha Ann, of Jericho, LI, daughter of Max and Mitzi Goorland, died on Wednesday, January 20, 2016, after a long battle with pancreatic cancer. She is survived by her daughters Margot and Amy Serwer; sister Michele, and her grandchildren Matthew, Russell, Samantha, and Liv. We will miss her energy, strength, and zest for life. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BLOCK, MARSHA ANN
